metadata.title: CVE-2018-10851 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
PowerDNS Authoritative Server 3.3.0 up to 4.1.4 excluding 4.1.5 and 4.0.6,and PowerDNS Recursor 3.2 up to 4.1.4 excluding 4.1.5 and 4.0.9, arevulnerable to a memory leak while parsing malformed records that can leadto remote denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.2.0-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
pdns-recursor package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.0-6').
